sentences.english: Lincoln said he understood the man's sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 林肯坦言，他理解老人的丧子之痛。

sentences.english: Question closely under, yang Silang said frankly eventually oneself true identity.
sentences.chinese: 逼问之下，杨四郎终于坦言了自己的真实身份。

sentences.english: He leveled with me that he had not told the truth.
sentences.chinese: 他向我坦言他没有讲真话。

sentences.english: He admitted he had been married before but said he divorced and married Lam in June.
sentences.chinese: 他坦言自己结过婚但已离婚，并于六月与林嘉欣成婚。

sentences.english: Then one day, Jenny confessed that she was afraid to turn seven.
sentences.chinese: 后来有一天，胡婧坦言她害怕长到七岁。

sentences.english: Blomkamp admitted that this authenticity came at a price.
sentences.chinese: 布洛姆坎普坦言获得这种真实性是要付出代价的。

sentences.english: Jing said candidly the time before each launch was his tensest moment when he had butterflies in his stomach.
sentences.chinese: 荆木春坦言，每一次发射前是他最为紧张的时刻。

sentences.english: That would be the worst thing he could do, Bushman told the producer.
sentences.chinese: 布西曼向这位制作人坦言，他不愿意这样做。

sentences.english: But he confesses to being wary of having “too many aims and goals”.
sentences.chinese: 然而他坦言要谨慎，以免立下“过多的目标”。

sentences.english: Eric says frankly that pretty girls cannot attract him.
sentences.chinese: 孙耀威坦言靓女不能吸引他。

sentences.english: Jade lute apologize to be yours, ritual that jade is the most people disappoint her.
sentences.chinese: 玉琴向佳期道歉，佳期坦言最令她失望的人是玉琴。

sentences.english: Li Jie St. frankly pressure to gastric perforation, a wound mole even have relapsed .
sentences.chinese: 李杰圣坦言压力大到胃穿孔，连痣疮都复发。

sentences.english: The agent of Juventus striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic admits he's held talks with AC Milan.
sentences.chinese: 尤文前锋伊布的经纪人坦言他已与AC米兰会谈。

sentences.english: Three Lin admitted that worry troubler old mother, did not dare to promise.
sentences.chinese: 三林坦言，担心连累老母，不敢答应。

sentences.english: He admits to feeling, finally he heaped heart end accept majesty.
sentences.chinese: 玥坦言对浚心中感觉，最后玥终接受荣。

sentences.english: Zhou Chutan character is " situation place forces " .

definition: to express/to show/to say/to state/to indicate/to mean
to refer to/to speak about/to talk about
to interview/to gather news/to hunt for and collect/to cover
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to interview (a particular person or on a particular topic)/special interview/special report based on such an interview
